name: Moon (itch) (Yee)
description:
Travel through space, avoid small planets, meteors and black holes, in this calm yet challenging game that defies gravity.

Reach the goal (green platform) in each level and try to reach home! Over 30 levels to enjoy, each with its own and unique challenge. Collect lives to make your travel easier, but be careful, not all lives are easy to get, so be thought of which you'll try to get.

Moon uses a custom gravity system made from scratch, simple, yet flexible, it allows for all sorts of obstacles and challenging things to provide fun and diversity in each level.
